name: Through Time (Demo)
description:
THROUGH TIME (DEMO)

NOTE: This is a demo from one of my cancelled projects, I've released this as a bit of fun and to hear any feedback you might have.

Through time is a Gameboy inspired mini adventure.

You play as Abbey, a young girl with a passion for history. On a visit to the "Museum of Ancient History" she stumbles upon a time traveller. Unbeknown to either of them this sets off a series of events that sees them thrust through time!

Travel across space and time, solve puzzles, aid historical figures and learn some history along the way. 

Comments and feedback are always welcome!

CONTROLS:

WALK: A/W/S/D OR Arrow Keys

Interact: Z Button
